name: Auna S.A.
description: Auna S.A. is a leading telecommunications and technology company based in Latin America, primarily focused on delivering innovative communication solutions and high-quality digital services. Established in 2003, Auna has rapidly expanded its reach throughout the region, providing a comprehensive range of products that include broadband internet, television, and mobile services. The company prides itself on its commitment to enhancing customer experience through cutting-edge technology and exceptional customer service. Auna's broadband services are designed to meet the demands of both residential and business clients, offering high-speed internet access with robust connectivity. Additionally, the company has made significant investments in expanding its fiber optic network, ensuring that it remains at the forefront of telecommunications infrastructure. Auna's television offerings include a diverse selection of channels and on-demand content, catering to a wide range of viewing preferences. The company is also exploring new horizons in the realm of smart home technology and Internet of Things (IoT) solutions, aiming to integrate connectivity into everyday life. With a mission to empower users through technology, Auna is dedicated to fostering digital inclusion and supporting the socio-economic development of the communities it serves. As Auna continues to innovate and grow, it remains committed to providing reliable and affordable services that connect people and enhance their digital lifestyles.

seo.meta_title: Auna S.A. | Leading Telecommunications and Technology Provider
seo.meta_description: Discover Auna S.A., a top telecommunications company in Latin America, providing innovative broadband, mobile, and smart home solutions. Explore Auna's commitment to digital connectivity.

faq.question: What services does Auna offer?
faq.answer: Auna offers broadband internet, mobile services, and television, along with smart home technology solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Auna?
faq.answer: Andrés F. Arriola is the CEO of Auna S.A.

faq.question: Where is Auna headquartered?
faq.answer: Auna is headquartered in Lima, Peru.
